titleStmt.title: T. A. Buckham et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1960

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Caseyville Union County Ky
September 27th 1864
To His Excellency
Gov Thos E. Bramlette
Frankfort
Ky
Mr. D. S. Berry Our Justice of the Peace has removed from this County to Illinois thereby vacating his office
We the Undersigned Citizens would respectfully recomend to your Excellency Mr. H. A. Pierson as a Suitable person to fill the unexpired term of Mr. D. S. Berry

Respectfully
T. A. Buckham
Wesley Hughes
Jos. J. Woodrick
J. W. Gregory
Wm Wilson
Jarvis Kornig
W. W. Pierson
Phil Snood
John Orr
Jas T. Pierson Jr
Danl Smith
Wm Applegate
James Boyll
W E Griffin
T J. Wood
Benamin Kibby
A J M Thompson
J. H. Herndon

Union Co
Justice Peace
H. A. Pierson
apptd
3d Oct/64
